thread.section_title: Plaza Opera Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Good hotel
thread.title_full: Good hotel - Review of Plaza Opera Hotel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: kanatsh
title: Good hotel
text: Nice place for a short term stay. Clean, good location, great service. Surprisingly, bathroom was rather large. The only problem we had was that every time our neighbours from above took a shower or used the toilet, we could hear the running of the water, which was especially disturbing during the night. But the overall impression was good.
